Game.Name: Matchbox Missions- Air, Land and Sea Rescue & Emergency Response
Game.Plot: Pilot a Fire Department Helicopter or a Marine Patrol Police Boat. Be a life-saving Paramedic racing to the hospital! Rescue people from raging fires and rising waters, and save the day! When you get the call, will you be a hero? Play as either a Police or Suspect in this great chase game set in MATCHBOX County. Four different terrains provide a varied and colorful backdrop to this fun and exciting 3D pursuit!
